alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 21 at 8:23PM CST until February 25 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Farm land near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 24.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 27.4 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Noxubee River Macon 26.0 24.8 Mon 8 pm CST 26.5 27.3 25.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued early Tuesday morning by 10 AM CST.
